title: AURORA Essential Oil Crystal Diffuser | Natural Quartz 500g | Power of Healing
description: Experience divine vibrations with AURORA Crystal Diffuser. Harmonize healing energy, choose Rose or Clear Quartz. Enhance you space with this eco friendly diffuser
cleaned_text: The AURORA - ambient crystal diffuser with light. When aurora crystals meet essential oils, a harmonizing combination of healing energy is created and released into its immediate surroundings. AURORA is a spirited and versatile crystal essential oil diffuser, designed with our company ethos in mind. It springs to life once the light is turned on, emitting a pretty pink glow. A crystal essential oil diffuser that delivers divine vibrations into any room it is placed. It's natural wooden base and glass reservoir is filled with a blissful union of rose or clear quartz stones which are then sprinkled with your choice of essential oils. ROSE QUARTZ is known for its amazing soothing properties, boosts feelings of peace and tranquillity. A wonderful stone to heal and protect the heart, balance emotions, relieve stress and tension. Known as the 'love stone' rose quartz allows love and calmness to flow within. Whilst.. CLEAR QUARTZ is known as the 'master healer'. A high vibrational stone that has the ability to declutter, revitalize and balance the mind, body and spirit. Amidst other benefits, it assists in warding off negativity, aids in concentration, and improves memory. It amplifies energies of other crystals close by and acts as a cleanser for the soul. A great choice of crystal diffuser for the bedroom, living area, during yoga or meditation practices and additionally, works particularly well as a night light. Features -Combine real quality aurora crystal with essential oils. -Dual functions as a crystal diffuser and ambiance light. -Neat, clean and eco friendly with minimal plastics utilized. -New Age Healing therapy which complements and enhances any decor.
